20110110142919.000|20110110142920.000|CC1|BUT THESE TRAGIC EVENTS REMIND  
20110110142920.000|20110110142923.000|CC1|US THAT ALL OF US IN OUR ROLES  
20110110142923.000|20110110142925.000|CC1|IN SERVICE TO OUR FELLOW        
20110110142925.000|20110110142926.000|CC1|CITIZENS COMES WITH A RISK.     
20110110142926.000|20110110142928.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE REAL QUESTIONS     
20110110142928.000|20110110142930.000|CC1|THOUGH ABOUT THE SAFETY OF      
20110110142930.000|20110110142932.000|CC1|MEMBERS, MOST OF WHOM GO ABOUT  
20110110142932.000|20110110142933.000|CC1|HERE BUSINESS WITHOUT SECURITY
